div.div: at Hanover, Ind. | L.S. Ayres Field

tr.td: Youth Football Day and Community Day at L.S. Ayres Field
Illinois College is making its first appearance at Hanover since 1941.
Hanover lost to the Blueboys, 51-28, last season.
Community Day & Youth Football Day at L.S. Ayres Field
Hanover wins the toss and defers to second half
